Data aggregation is one of the pillars of data analysis, the process where _tidy_ data is gathered and expressed in a summary form. Bat survey data tends to be aggregated in two ways:  

1. over a given time period, or
2. spatially for locations or a factor related to a location (e.g. woodland)
